summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of May 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance of the account. The document highlights various transactions, including outgoing money transfers and fees associated with the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in this financial statement, which outlines his account activity for May 2015.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: M. Rites S. McCorquodale
persons.context: M. Rites S. McCorquodale is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein made multiple outgoing money transfers to M. Rites S. McCorquodale's account.

events.title: Account Statement Period Begins
events.description: The financial statement covers the account activity starting from May 1, 2015.

events.title: Account Statement Period Ends
events.description: The financial statement concludes with the account balance as of May 31, 2015.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for May 2015.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
M. Rites S. McCorquodale is a recipient of funds transferred from Epstein's account.
The account had various outgoing money transfers and service charges during the statement period.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2015, was $168,626.13.
